data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of New Mexico, United States.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of New Mexico, United States

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in New Mexico, United States and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of New Mexico, United States to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of New Mexico.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of New Mexico, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 2,099,700 people living in New Mexico.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of New Mexico.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of New Mexico, United States has a population of 2,099,700.

We estimate New Mexico has 554,451 people who might know Jesus, 1,051,628 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 493,621 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: New Mexico
location.cities_list: Albuquerque, Las Cruces, Enchanted Hills, Rio Rancho, Santa Fe
location.cities_list_w_pop: Albuquerque (559,121), Las Cruces (101,643), Enchanted Hills (87,521), Rio Rancho (87,521), Santa Fe (84,099)
